intro.description: This test was copied from the word doc containing test descriptions. It should be reworked to be more explicit about which XHTML files to use.

item.title: Find XHTML Docs
item.description: Find some XHTML docs in the help system (you’ll have to import plugin in workspace and look for the .xhtml file extension)

item.title: Open docs
item.description: Open these docs in the help window and help view; make sure they appear correctly

item.title: Find markup
item.description: Open the markup and find the parts that are filtered (e.g. there might be a windows only section)

item.title: Confirm filtered sections
item.description: Confirm the parts are filtered from the non-applicable platforms. E.g. if it’s windows only, should only be visible on windows

item.title: Search for word
item.description: Search for a word in the XHTML doc. It should show up as a potential hit.

item.title: Show actual hits
item.description: Change preferences (Help preferences page) to show actual hits

item.title: Repeat search
item.description: Repeat the same search. It should only find the result if the word is visible in the doc. E.g. on windows it should find it, on linux it shouldn’t.
